website_summaries.verdict: A variety pack with a sampling of some of the best dog treats Plato has to offer.
pros: A great choice for trying several of the brands popular grain-free turkey treats – pumpkin, sweet potato, and cranberry
Dog owners rave about how much their dogs love them
cons: Some consumers were surprised that the packs are smaller than expected, but many were excited for their dogs to try the different flavors

customer_reviews.title: Product past Best By Date!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally annoyed with the idea that just because these are dog treats that you shipped products with "Best by" dates of 01/17/17; 05/03/17; and 05/10/17. I want to return these and receive product that is not close to the "Best by" date! This happens to be a very good product if received before Best By date is expired!
customer_reviews.author: MAS

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these treats, but I do break them in quarters, since all 5 of my adopted rescued Chinese Cresteds are small dogs. I have recently found the very small version of this company's treats.
customer_reviews.author: D. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good treats! But....
customer_reviews.text: Please look at size! Didn't realize they were the really small bags. :( We do really like them for our dogs. They came fairly quick. Will buy the 12 oz bags next time. More economical. This ends up being $20 for 12 oz.
customer_reviews.author: L. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Good treats - without the itch factor
customer_reviews.text: The only treats I can give my maltipoo that doesn't make him break out and itch. I like how easy it is to break these apart so I can make the treats last longer. Having 3 different flavors is nice for variety and he doesn't turn his nose up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Hard As a Rock
customer_reviews.text: These treats came late. My dog has loved these treats in the past, but the last package I received the treats were hard as a rock.
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these and I love that There are simple ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Robin D.

customer_reviews.title: Bully Mom
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended to me because they are healthy. My bully loves them. Will be ordering more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Each one was a new delight. Cant figure which one is her favorite so ...
customer_reviews.text: Each one was a new delight. Cant figure which one is her favorite so will have to keep buying them all.
customer_reviews.author: shopping at midnight

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Max loved all of these treats!!! I really love the fact that it is made of all natural ingredients!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Kennamore

customer_reviews.title: Undecided...
customer_reviews.text: These packages must be too old......not fresh. My dog doesnt seem to take to them like usual.
customer_reviews.author: salvador123

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy these treats...
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these treats which is why I keep buying them. As I have a dog with grain allergies, this is the perfect treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great treat for the puppy.
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves his treats and I love them because they are not full of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Snail Lady

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Snacks
customer_reviews.text: Healthy snacks. Our dog has multiple allergies and these snacks she can eat.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Callaway

customer_reviews.title: The treats are great, but the sample size is very expensive
customer_reviews.text: The treats are great, but the sample size is very expensive. I should have looked more carefully. I normally pay $15.00 for 12 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Gumbo queen

customer_reviews.title: Please make available again
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that I could get a variety pack at a great price. Would order again if it was available to order this way. Love that fact that it is Prime so I pay no shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but they love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are picky about many things, but they love these treats. I feel good about them, too. My vet approves as well!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Doggie loves these
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves these. Items arrived quickly and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Marie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great treat and healthy too!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these treats - my dogs love them and are a highly motivating treat for my agility dog. They are healthy too!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Graham

product_meta.title: Plato EOS Grain Free Turkey Recipe Dog Treat 3 Flavor Variety Bundle: (1) Plato EOS Turkey With Sweet Potato Treats, (1) Plato EOS Turkey With Pumpkin Treats, and (1) Plato EOS Turkey With Cranberries Treats, 4 Oz.
